#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;

float mini(float x, float y) { return (x < y)? x: y; }

float fun(int h,int m){
	if(h==12)
		h=0;
	if(m==60)
		m=0;
	float hour=0.5*((h*60)+m);		
	float min=6*m;
	float res=abs(hour-min);
	res=mini(360-res,res);
	return res;
}

int main(){
	int h,m;
	float res;
	cin>>h;
	cin>>m;
	res=fun(h,m);
	cout<<res<<endl;
	return 0;
}
